Package com.esotericsoftware.kryo.serialize

Class Summary
ArraySerializer Serializes arrays.
BeanSerializer Serializes Java beans using bean accessor methods.
BigDecimalSerializer Serializes instances of BigDecimal.
BigIntegerSerializer Serializes instances of BigInteger.
BooleanSerializer Writes a 1 byte boolean.
ByteSerializer Writes 1 byte.
CharSerializer Writes a 2 byte char.
CollectionSerializer Serializes objects that implement the Collection interface.
CompatibleFieldSerializer Serializes objects using direct field assignment, with limited support for forward and backward compatibility.
CustomSerializer  
DateSerializer Serializes instances of Date.
DoubleSerializer Writes an 8 byte double.
EnumSerializer Writes a 1-3 byte enum.
FieldSerializer Serializes objects using direct field assignment.
FloatSerializer Writes a 4 byte float.
IntSerializer Writes a 1-5 byte integer.
LongSerializer Writes a 1-10 byte long.
MapSerializer Serializes objects that implement the Map interface.
ReferenceFieldSerializer Serializes objects using direct field assignment, handling object references and cyclic graphs.
SerializableSerializer Serializes objects using Java's built in serialization mechanism.
ShortSerializer Writes a 1-3 byte short.
SimpleSerializer<T> Convenience class that provides simpler methods for reading and writing object data.
StringSerializer Writes a String as UTF-8 bytes.
